data.name: CluCoin
data.description:
## What Is CluCoin (CLU)?

CluCoin is a token for a cryptocurrency project launched in May 2021. CluShare is a decentralized Binance platform which enables its users to earn a passive income by holding tokens on the platform: a staking-as-a-platform service.

CluShare plans to create a decentralized exchange with a crypto gateway, as well as CluCoin (which is a coin on its own blockchain with a staking option).


### Who Are the Founders of CluCoin?

The creator of CluCoin goes by DNP3 on Twitter, and describes himself as a computer engineer, gamer and giveawayer. 


#### What Makes CluCoin Unique?

CluCoin is unique due to its charity aspect. The project, CluShare, was built to stake tokens with the goal of providing a charity focus to help people around the world. There will be a dedicated charity wallet, and each month, dividends earned will be sent to the charities that have been nominated by shareholders. 


#### Related Pages:

Check out [Binance](https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/binance/).

Learn more about [tokenomics](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/article/what-is-tokenomics).

Learn more about [PancakeSwap](https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/pancakeswap/)<sup>.</sup>

Check out the CoinMarketCap [blog](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/categories/blog).


#### How Many CluCoin (CLU) Coins Are There in Circulation?

According to CluShare’s [whitepaper](https://clucoin.com/whitepaper), there are a total of 1,000,000,000,000,000 tokens produced: one quadrillion coins. 30 trillion will be burned prior to the launch on PancakeSwap, while 200 trillion tokens are set aside for a pre-launch with a 1% bonus. 300 trillion more will be burned over 10 months, with 100 trillion in an establishment wallet, 200 trillion on PancakeSwap, 3 trillion in the charity wallet, 2 trillion on marketing and 195 trillion on exchange listing. 


### How Is the CluCoin Network Secured?

The CLU coin is a BEP-20 token, which means that it is secured on the [Binance Smart Chain](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/article/what-is-binance-smart-chain) and is an extension of [ERC-20](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/erc-20).


### Where Can You Buy CluCoin (CLU)?

As of May 2021, crypto enthusiasts can purchase CluCoin from BKEx and DODO on Binance Smart Chain. You Can also buy CLU on PancakeSwap.

For more information about buying cryptocurrencies, check out [CoinMarketCap’s how to buy crypto guide.](https://coinmarketcap.com/how-to-buy-bitcoin/)
